channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- ZYREX POPUP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- ZYREX POPUP

item.title: CVE-2023-0924|2024-08-02T05:24:34.720Z -- unknown -- zyrex%20popup
item.description: The ZYREX POPUP WordPress plugin through 1.0 does not validate the type of files uploaded when creating a popup, allowing a high privileged user (such as an Administrator) to upload arbitrary files, even when modifying the file system is disallowed, such as in a multisite install.
